images.caption: Figure 1:Number of steps required forNDBandCNto compute the square and inverse square roots of scalar numbers between 0 and 1 (in log-scale) up to precision10−1010^{-10}to emphasize the behavior for small eigenvalues.

Figure 2:Number of steps required forNDBandCNto compute the square and inverse square roots of scalars between 0 and 1 (in linear scale) up to precision10−1010^{-10}. We added a shift forNDBiterations to improve visibility on the y-axis.
